markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Summon Celestial Kin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1364) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
any aasimar [lineage](/Traits.aspx?ID=317) feat

</column>

---

You have a connection to the celestial realms, allowing you to summon a celestial ally. Once per day, you can cast [_summon celestial_](/Spells.aspx?ID=317) as a 5th-level divine innate spell, but the celestial summoned must be from the same category as your own lineage, such as a creature with the [angel](/Traits.aspx?ID=8) trait if you are angelkin.
name: Summon Celestial Kin
